"Pushing Tin" features a complex and engaging rivalry between two air traffic controllers, highlighting the human drama and consequences of a feud.

"Armageddon" is a thrilling and thought-provoking film about a group of scientists forced to confront the apocalypse and their own mortality.

If you're interested in a humorous and fast-paced movie, then "Hitch" (2005) starring Vincent De Paul and Robinne Lee is a must-see. It's a witty murder mystery that will keep you guessing until the very end.

If you're looking for something more historical, then "2010" (N/A) starring Taliesin Jaffe and Candice Bergen is a visually stunning and thought-provoking film about an expedition to Jupiter.
